channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [AMQ-2121] Occasional Deadlock in DuplexNetworkMBeanTest - contention on brokerService with NetworkConnector
item.description:

Found 1 deadlock.
item.summary: Occasional Deadlock in DuplexNetworkMBeanTest - contention on brokerService with NetworkConnector

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
brokerService was an inappropriate shared lock, using the VMUrl is less contentious, no real need for a seperate lock object.

rev: 744975
